mapper.update: update l_grain_price set keyid=keyid ,grainid=#{grainid} ,price1=#{price1} ,price2=#{price2} ,price3=#{price3} ,price4=#{price4} ,price5=#{price5} ,price6=#{price6} where keyid=#{keyid}

update l_grain_price set keyid=keyid ,grainid=#{grainid} ,price1=#{price1} ,price2=#{price2} ,price3=#{price3} ,price4=#{price4} ,price5=#{price5} ,price6=#{price6} ,graindepotid=#{graindepotid} where 1=1 and keyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and keyid =#{Where_Id} and keyid=#{Where_keyid} and grainid=#{Where_grainid} and price1=#{Where_price1} and price2=#{Where_price2} and price3=#{Where_price3} and price4=#{Where_price4} and price5=#{Where_price5} and price6=#{Where_price6} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid}
mapper.select: select t.keyid "keyid", t.grainid "grainid", t.price1 "price1", t.price2 "price2", t.price3 "price3", t.price4 "price4", t.price5 "price5", t.price6 "price6", t.graindepotid "graindepotid" from l_grain_price t where keyid=#{keyid}

select t.keyid "keyid", t.grainid "grainid", t.price1 "price1", t.price2 "price2", t.price3 "price3", t.price4 "price4", t.price5 "price5", t.price6 "price6", t.graindepotid "graindepotid" from l_grain_price t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.price1=#{price1} and t.price2=#{price2} and t.price3=#{price3} and t.price4=#{price4} and t.price5=#{price5} and t.price6=#{price6} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}

select t.keyid "keyid", t.grainid "grainid", t.price1 "price1", t.price2 "price2", t.price3 "price3", t.price4 "price4", t.price5 "price5", t.price6 "price6", t.graindepotid "graindepotid" from l_grain_price t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.price1=#{price1} and t.price2=#{price2} and t.price3=#{price3} and t.price4=#{price4} and t.price5=#{price5} and t.price6=#{price6} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
mapper.delete: delete from l_grain_price where 1=1 and keyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and keyid =#{Where_Id} and keyid=#{Where_keyid} and grainid=#{Where_grainid} and price1=#{Where_price1} and price2=#{Where_price2} and price3=#{Where_price3} and price4=#{Where_price4} and price5=#{Where_price5} and price6=#{Where_price6} and graindepotid=#{Where_graindepotid}
mapper.select: select t.keyid "keyid", t.grainid "grainid", t.price1 "price1", t.price2 "price2", t.price3 "price3", t.price4 "price4", t.price5 "price5", t.price6 "price6", t.graindepotid "graindepotid", lg.grainname "grainname" from l_grain_price t left join l_grain lg on lg.grainid=t.grainid where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.price1=#{price1} and t.price2=#{price2} and t.price3=#{price3} and t.price4=#{price4} and t.price5=#{price5} and t.price6=#{price6} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}

select count(*) from l_grain_price t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.keyid!=#{NoId} and t.grainid=#{grainid} and t.price1=#{price1} and t.price2=#{price2} and t.price3=#{price3} and t.price4=#{price4} and t.price5=#{price5} and t.price6=#{price6} and t.graindepotid=#{graindepotid}
SELECT COUNT(*) from l_grain_price where 1=1 and grainid=#{grainid} and keyid!=#{keyid}
